amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 107, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 21 - 75. Record Vote Number: 136.

action.text: Amendment SA 107 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S1883) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 107 proposed by Senator Paul.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 107, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 21 - 75. Record Vote Number: 136.
